General.Name: Schulte-Schlagbaum AG
General.Description: Schulte-Schlagbaum AG develops, manufactures, and markets components, systems, and solutions for the locking and organization of buildings in Germany and internationally. It provides locking systems, including electronic door and furniture locking systems, and mechanical locker locks; deposit and coin-collecting locks; and locks and striking plate systems comprising interior doors, exterior and functional doors, profile frame doors, and emergency doors, as well as gates. The company also offers guest management systems; and cash register systems. It offers its products for residential buildings, hotels, clinics/residences, universities/schools, libraries, swimming pools/leisure facilities, sports/fitness facilities, industry management, community catering, and restaurants. The company was founded in 1833 and is headquartered in Velbert, Germany.
